name: Shilpi Biswal
professional_summary: Computer Science Engineering student with hands-on experience in software development through academic projects and personal initiatives.
Proven ability to work effectively within teams and manage projects to successful completion.
Seeking opportunities to apply technical skills in software development and contribute to innovative, impactful projects.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering

details: Developed a guided meditation application providing daily spiritual readings for devotees.
Built the application using Flutter to ensure a seamless and user-friendly experience.
Collaborated with stakeholders to design UI and implement features for enhanced engagement.

projects.title: Company Expense Management System
description: Developed a web application for company expense tracking and management.
Implemented receipt generation, employee management, project status tracking, and expense monitoring.

projects.title: Literary Retail Platform
description: Built a MERN-based platform for book browsing, buying, and selling.
Implemented an AI-powered chatbot for personalized book recommendations and user assistance.
Designed a recommendation system using database insights and trend analysis.

projects.title: ATS Resume Analyzer & Job Search
description: Developed an AI-powered resume evaluation and job matching system.
Integrated Google Gemini and JSearch APIs for live job search and salary estimation.
Implemented ATS compatibility scoring, skill gap analysis, and personalized improvement suggestions.

projects.title: MindPop – Gamified Learning Platform
description: Developed a gamified learning platform for neurodivergent children with ADHD.
Implemented cognitive games such as Seguin Board, Jigsaw, and TappyType.
Used MongoDB for progress tracking and data analysis for medical professionals.
